page.title: 18COUNCIL ADMINISTRATION
page.content: {Tedder Hall, Manby There are thirty-four council houses in Holton-le-Clay.They are at St.Peters Close.They are administered from{Tedder Hall, Manby.}The{council are also{responsible}for{road repairs, {signs,lighting,grass cutting, water and{drainage,}and{refuse collection The bin men come to Holton-le-clay once a week.The{households}are given {two dust bin bags}for their rubbish. {Trades people}have to{pay}for their {bin}bags.Local trades people are angry that they have to pay{50p per {bag.}Many of them have decided to remove their own rubbish to the council dumps so that they don't have to pay the bag charges.
